question.questionText: Salt crystals form when the water evaporates from saltwater. Describe the salt crystals.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The salt crystals are squares with Xs on top.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: Salt crystals are small and white.
They are square with Xs in the middle.
The salt crystal evaporates when water gets by them.
The salt crystals will look like small squares with Xs.
